Title: Silverlight Controls Library with RTL Support
Description:
Small library with custom controls for Silverlight with RTL support. Can be used to display textual content with Hebrew or other languages that require RTL.

My Blog: http://blogs.microsoft.co.il/blogs/maxim
Related Project: http://www.codeplex.com/SilverRTL
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Small library with custom controls for Silverlight with RTL support. Can be used to display textual content with Hebrew or other languages that require RTL.
